text: 🇷🇺💪 Two years since Russia's invasion of Ukraine 🇺🇦 and the impact on energy security and decarbonization cannot be ignored. Europe's reduction of Russian energy dependence has created a solar energy paradox. 🌞💡 Meanwhile, Beijing's energy security anxieties have been reinforced. 🇨🇳💪👀 Have we made progress in the transition to sustainable energy sources? 🌱💚 What role will solar energy play in our future? 🤔
